00017 enum CallCode {
00018     CALLCODE_AA = 6,
00019     CALLCODE_BB = 7,
00020     CALLCODE_AB = 8,
00021     CALLCODE_NOCALL = 11,
00022     CALLCODE_OTV = 12
00023 };
00024 
00025 enum CallTranslated {
00026     TRANSLATED_CALL_AA = 0,
00027     TRANSLATED_CALL_AB = 1,
00028     TRANSLATED_CALL_BB = 2,
00029     TRANSLATED_CALL_NOCALL = -1,
00030     TRANSLATED_CALL_OTV = -2
00031 };
00032 
00033 enum CallFormat {
00034     FORMAT_NONE = 0,
00035     FORMAT_CALLCODE = 1,
00036     FORMAT_BASECALL = 2,
00037     FORMAT_TRANSLATED = 3,
00038 };
00039 
00040 enum CoreColumn {
00041     CORE_COLUMN_CALLS = 0,
00042     CORE_COLUMN_CONFIDENCE = 1,
00043     CORE_COLUMN_LOGRATIO = 2,
00044     CORE_COLUMN_STRENGTH = 3,
00045     CORE_COLUMN_A_ALLELE_SIGNAL = 4,
00046     CORE_COLUMN_B_ALLELE_SIGNAL = 5
00047 };
00048 
00049 class CodeMap
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     static std::map<int, std::string> CallCodes;             // <CallCode, AA:BB:AB:NoCall:OTV>
00053     static std::map<int, std::string> TranslatedCalls;       // <CallTranslated, AA:BB:AB:NoCall:OTV>
00054     static std::map<int, CallCode> TranslatedToCallCodes;   // <CallTranslated, 6:7:8:11:12>
00055     static std::map<int, CallTranslated> CodeToTranslatedCalls; // <CallCode, 0:1:2:-1:-2>
00056     static std::map<int, std::string> SampleColumns;         // <CoreColumn, call_code:confidence:log_ratio:strength>
00057 
00058 public:
00059     static void init();
00060     static bool isAlleleCodeValid(std::string& strCode);
00061     static bool replaceAllelesAB(std::string& strCode, std::string& strAlleleA, std::string& strAlleleB, std::string strSeparator = "");
00062     static std::string nameCodeToFSBC(std::string strCode, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB);
00063     static std::string nameCodeToVcfByAlt(std::string strCallCode, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB, std::string strAltAllele);
00064     static std::string nameCodeToVcfFSBC(std::string strCode, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB);
00065     static std::string nameCodeToPedFSBC(std::string strCode, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB);
00066     static std::string callCodeToFSBC(CallCode code, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB);
00067     static std::string callCodeToVcf(CallCode code, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB, std::string strRefAllele, std::string strAltAllele);
00068     static std::string callCodeToVcfFSBC(CallCode code, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB);
00069     static std::string callCodeToPedFSBC(CallCode code, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB);
00070     static std::string translatedCallToFSBC(CallTranslated call, std::string strAlleleA, std::string strAlleleB, bool bPedigree = false);
00071     static std::string codeToTranslatedCall(CallCode code);
00072     static CallFormat nameFormatToCode(std::string strCode);
00073     static std::string callFormatToName(CallFormat format);
00074 };
